title: Road21Bitcoin
author: Road21Bitcoin
content: Binance CEO CZ has just shamefully resigned today and pleaded guilty to fraud and money laundering violations. His company will also be forced to pay a whopping $4.3B fine.For years, he claimed anyone who criticized him or his corrupt exchange are spreading "FUD" - but turns out,  it was all truthful. We have over 480+ tweets and articles mentioning the fraudulent practices of Binance. We were attacked left and right by the maxi mob, but, as per usual - Time proved us right, again.Source: https://twitter.com/WhaleWire/status/1727017951230894441Trending Sources: https://twitter.com/search?q=Binance&src=trend_click&vertical=trends

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: This is serious! First was Bittrex bankruptcy,  then now CZ resignation on the ground of fraud.  How the market will respond to this is what is not clear but we can already see serious dump happening across board. This is a confirmation that CEX are not too safe at this moment.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Already existing thread: Changpeng Zhao (CZ) has resigned as Binance CEO.Best to lock this thread to avoid repetition.
